Articles.Content:
Ever wanted to hold a Kerbal in your hand, look him right in the eye and maybe even congratulate him for surviving a particularly perilous trip? Well now you can! Introducing our limited edition 3D printed figurines with the IVA lineup, have Bob, Bill and Jeb on your desk today!

You can find them at http://www.shapeways.com/shops/kerbalspaceprogram

<img src="http://i.imgur.com/kuoOr4E.png" border="0" width="768" />
